document.discussion_title: Watch Trailer: 'Pokemon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel' 2016 Movie
document.topic_text: Aug 11, 2016 11:51 AM EDT By Sarene Mae Butao , UniversityHerald Reporter Watch Trailer: 'Pokemon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel' 2016 Movie “Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel” will be released this fall and new Mythical Pokemon will be introduced.(Photo : Photo by Warner Bros. Pictures) The Pokémon legend is back to the spotlight again because of the success of the augmented reality app, "Pokémon Go". The upcoming release of the "Pokémon Sun" and "Pokémon Sun", also marks the official distribution of a 2016 film, "Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel". The Pokémon Company International introduces to the world the movie through an official English-language website. The company also introduced the first-ever English trailer for the movie "Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel", YIBADA reported. In this new movie trailer, Magaerna was introduced. Magaerna is a new Mythical Pokémon which will have a great role in the movie. The creators of the film released the synopsis that gives an idea about the movie's plot. The trailer shows a new Mythical Pokémon, Volcanion, falling from the sky. Then, a mysterious force binds Ash to the Pokémon. Now, the Volcanion cannot get away, and Ash is dragged along. Magaerna, on the other hand, is explained briefly. The Pokémon was said to be created 500 years ago. Now, a corrupt official, cabinet minister Jarvis wants to use the Pokémon 's mysterious powers to rule the mechanical kingdom of Azod, Anime News Network reported. The film is set for release later in 2016. Reports says that the film will be distributed this fall. Although there is no official release date announced yet. Meanwhile, players of Trading Card Game (TCG) can also get their hands on a Volcanion in the game's newest expansion pack, "XY- Steam Siege". There will be 115 new cards to be introduced including Shiny Mega Gardevoir-EX. The BREAK evolution mechanic will also be introduced, such as Yveltal BREAK and Xerneas BREAK. Advertisement Volcanion will also be on 3DS Nintendo games ike Alpha sapphire and Omega Ruby. When players get the Pokémon, it will be at level 70. The codes will be sold at official retailers. © 2016 University Herald, All rights reserved. Do not reproduce without permission. Advertisement
